resources.string: Apple resmi mengumumkan adanya produk baru yakni iPhone 14 series sejak 7 September 2022. Ponsel dengan logo apel "kroak" ini dijadwalkan akan dipasarkan di Indonesia pada 4 November 2022. Adapun iPhone 14 series terdiri dari iPhone 14, iphone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, dan iPhone 14 Pro Max

LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000 nits (typ), 2000 nits (HBM)
6.7 inches, 110.2 cm2 (~88.3% screen-to-body ratio)
1290 x 2796 pixels, 19.5:9 ratio (~460 ppi density)
Ceramic Shield glass

160.7 x 77.6 x 7.9 mm (6.33 x 3.06 x 0.31 in)
240 g (8.47 oz)

Glass front (Corning-made glass), glass back (Corning-made glass), stainless steel frame

Li-Ion 4323 mAh, non-removable (16.68 Wh)
Wired, PD2.0, 50% in 30 min (advertised)

15W wireless (MagSafe)
7.5W wireless (Qi)
